Name: Safari Cannon
About the game: Shoot across the African Safari and discover all the wild beasts of the savannah. A wholesome game, perfect for the whole family that will have you in stitches as you dodge elephants, bounce off hippos, and avoid monkeys who will do their best to stop you. A pickup and play game that will keep you entertained for hours.
